query.query: {"pigql":"q = load \"<opportunity>\"; q = group q by {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}; q = filter q by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; p = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"]; p = foreach p generate {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('Amount'), 0) as 'Amount'; a = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current quarter\"..\"current day\"]; a = foreach a generate {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('Amount'), 0) as 'This_Quarter_Won_Amount'; b = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 quarter ago\"..\"current day - 1 quarter\"]; b = foreach b generate {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('Amount'), 0) as 'Last_Quarter_Won_Amount'; c = union a, b; c = group c by {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}; c = foreach c generate {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce((coalesce(sum('This_Quarter_Won_Amount'), 0) - coalesce(sum('Last_Quarter_Won_Amount'), 0)) / coalesce(sum('Last_Quarter_Won_Amount'), 0), 0) as 'QoQ'; d = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"]; d = foreach d generate {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('Amount'), 0) as 'This_Year_Won_Amount'; e = filter q by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 year ago\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]; e = foreach e generate {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum('Amount'), 0) as 'Last_Year_Won_Amount'; f = union d, e; f = group f by {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}; f = foreach f generate {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} as {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce((coalesce(sum('This_Year_Won_Amount'), 0) - coalesce(sum('Last_Year_Won_Amount'), 0)) / coalesce(sum('Last_Year_Won_Amount'), 0), 0) as 'YoY'; x = group p by {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} full, c by {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}} full, f by {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}; x = foreach x generate coalesce(p.{{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(c.{{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, f.{{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}})) as {{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asGrouping()}}, coalesce(sum(p.'Amount'), 0) as 'sum_Amount', coalesce(sum(c.'QoQ'), 0) as 'sum_QoQ', coalesce(sum(f.'YoY'), 0) as 'sum_YoY'; x = order x by {{cell(step_grouping.selection, 0, \"order\").asObject()}} desc;","measures":"{{cell(step_grouping.selection, 0, \"measure\").asObject()}}","autoFilter":true,"groups":["{{cell(dropdown_customer_grouping.selection, 0, \"value\").asObject()}}"],"dimensions":[],"order":[]}

{"measures":[["sum","finalcf",null,{"display":" "}]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\"; a = foreach a generate (case when {{column(kpi_yoy_growth_percent.result, [\"sum_Amount\"]).asObject() }} > 0 then \"#3CAF6D\" when {{column(kpi_yoy_growth_percent.result, [\"sum_Amount\"]).asObject() }} < 0 then \"#D4504C\" else \"#7D98B3\" end) as 'RAG'; a = group a by 'RAG'; a = foreach a generate 'RAG' as 'RAG', 0.95 as 'sum_finalcf';","groups":["RAG"],"order":[]}

{"measures":[["sum","QoQ"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = group a by ('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Quarter'); a = foreach a generate 'CloseDate_Year' + \"~~~\" + 'CloseDate_Quarter' as 'CloseDate_Year~~~CloseDate_Quarter', ((sum('Amount') / sum(sum('Amount')) over([ - 4.. - 4] partition by all order by ('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Quarter'))) - 1) as 'sum_QoQ'; a = offset a 4;","autoFilter":true,"groups":[["CloseDate_Year","CloseDate_Quarter"]],"dimensions":[],"order":[]}

{"measures":[["avg","YoY"],["sum","Amount"]],"pigql":"a = load \"<opportunity>\"; a = filter a by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; a = filter a by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"current year\"..\"current day\"]; b = load \"<opportunity>\"; b = filter b by 'IsWon' == \"true\"; b = filter b by date('CloseDate_Year', 'CloseDate_Month', 'CloseDate_Day') in [\"1 year ago\"..\"current day - 1 year\"]; c = group a by all full, b by all; c = foreach c generate coalesce((coalesce(sum(a['Amount']), 0) - coalesce(sum(b['Amount']), 0)) / coalesce(sum(b['Amount']), 0), 0) as 'avg_YoY', coalesce(sum(a['Amount']), 0) - coalesce(sum(b['Amount']), 0) as 'sum_Amount'; fake = load \"<opportunity>\"; fake = group fake by all; fake = foreach fake generate 0 as 'avg_YoY', 0 as 'sum_Amount'; final = union c, fake; final = group final by all; final = foreach final generate sum('sum_Amount') as 'sum_Amount', sum('avg_YoY') as 'avg_YoY';","autoFilter":true,"groups":[],"dimensions":[],"order":[]}
